list.musicians: SELECT ?Musician ?Birth_Date (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) ?Band WHERE { ?MusicianItem a ?SubClass. ?MusicianItem rdfs:label ?Musician. ?MusicianItem music:birthDate ?Birth_Date. ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf music:Musician. OPTIONAL {?BandItem rdfs:label ?Band. FILTER(LANG(?Band) = "en"). ?BandItem music:hasComponent ?MusicianItem .} FILTER(LANG(?Musician) = "en") } GROUP BY ?Musician ?Birth_Date ?Band
list.musicians_only_bands: SELECT ?Musician ?Birth_Date ?Band WHERE { ?Band music:hasComponent ?Musician. ?Musician music:birthDate ?Birth_Date } ORDER BY ?Band
list.musicians_only_solists: SELECT ?Musician ?Birth_Date (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) WHERE { ?Musician a ?SubClass. ?Musician music:birthDate ?Birth_Date. ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf music:Musician. FILTER(NOT EXISTS { ?Musician music:componentOf ?Band })} GROUP BY ?Musician ?Birth_Date
list.albums: SELECT ?Album ?Owner ?Sales ?Certificate ?Release_Date WHERE { ?Owner music:hasAlbum ?AlbumItem. ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. ?AlbumItem music:salesCount ?Sales. ?AlbumItem music:releaseDate ?Release_Date. OPTIONAL {?AlbumItem music:hasCertification ?CertificateItem. ?CertificateItem rdfs:label ?Certificate. } FILTER(LANG(?Album) = "en" && LANG(?Certificate) = "en"). }
list.songs: SELECT ?Song ?Composer ?Album WHERE { ?SongItem music:writtenBy ?ComposerItem. ?SongItem rdfs:label ?Song. ?ComposerItem rdfs:label ?Composer. OPTIONAL {?AlbumItem bag:hasItem ?Track . ?Track bag:itemContent ?SongItem . ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. FILTER(LANG(?Album) = "en")} FILTER(LANG(?Song) = "en" && LANG(?Composer) = "en")}
list.genres: SELECT ?Genre (COUNT(?Song) AS ?Songs) WHERE { ?Genre a music:Genre. ?Song music:hasGenre ?Genre. } GROUP BY ?Genre
list.events: SELECT ?Event (group_concat(?Host; separator=", ") as ?Main_Hosts) ?City ?Nation ?Continent WHERE { ?Host music:hostOf ?EventItem. ?EventItem music:locatedIn ?CityItem. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?Event. ?CityItem music:locatedIn ?NationItem. ?CityItem rdfs:label ?City. ?NationItem music:locatedIn ?ContinentItem. ?NationItem rdfs:label ?Nation. ?ContinentItem rdfs:label ?Continent. FILTER(LANG(?Event) = "en" && LANG(?City) = "en" && LANG(?Nation) = "en" && LANG(?Continent) = "en") } GROUP BY ?Event ?City ?Nation ?Continent

list_filter.events: SELECT ?Event ?City ?Nation ?Continent ?Attendance WHERE {{ ?EventItem music:locatedIn ?CityItem. ?CityItem music:locatedIn ?NationItem. ?NationItem music:locatedIn ?ContinentItem. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?Event. ?EventItem music:eventHasTag ?Tag. ?Tag rdfs:label ?TagLabel. ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf music:Event. ?EventItem a ?SubClass. ?SubClass rdfs:label ?SubClassLabel. ?EventItem music:attendance ?Attendance. ?CityItem rdfs:label ?City. ?NationItem rdfs:label ?Nation. ?ContinentItem rdfs:label ?Continent. FILTER(LANG(?Event) = "en" && LANG(?TagLabel) = "en" && LANG(?SubClassLabel) = "en" && LANG(?Event) = "en" && LANG(?City) = "en" && LANG(?Nation) = "en" && LANG(?Continent) = "en" && {})}} GROUP BY ?Event ?City ?Nation ?Continent ?Attendance
list_filter.songs: SELECT ?Song ?Album ?Composer ?Genre WHERE {{ ?SongItem music:writtenBy ?ComposerItem. ?SongItem music:hasGenre ?GenreItem. ?ComposerItem rdfs:label ?Composer. ?SongItem rdfs:label ?Song. ?GenreItem rdfs:label ?Genre. OPTIONAL {{?AlbumItem bag:hasItem ?Track . ?Track bag:itemContent ?SongItem . ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. FILTER(LANG(?Album) = "en")}} FILTER(LANG(?Song) = "en" && LANG(?Genre) = "en" && LANG(?Composer) = "en" && {} )}} ORDER BY ?Track
list_filter.albums: SELECT ?Album ?Owner ?Sales ?Certification ?Release_Date WHERE {{ ?OwnerItem music:hasAlbum ?AlbumItem. ?AlbumItem music:salesCount ?Sales. ?AlbumItem music:releaseDate ?Release_Date. ?AlbumItem music:hasCertification ?CertificationItem. ?OwnerItem rdfs:label ?Owner. ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. ?CertificationItem rdfs:label ?Certification. FILTER(LANG(?Album) = "en" && LANG(?Certification) = "en" && LANG(?Owner) = "en" && {})}}

single.event: SELECT ?Event ?Start_Date ?End_Date ?Attendance ?Type ?Manifest (group_concat(?Tag; separator=", ") as ?Tags) WHERE {{ ?EventItem a music:Event. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?Event. ?EventItem music:eventStartDate ?Start_Date. ?EventItem music:eventEndDate ?End_Date. ?EventItem music:attendance ?Attendance. ?EventItem music:manifest ?Manifest. ?EventItem music:eventType ?Type. ?EventItem music:eventHasTag ?Tag. FILTER(REGEX(?Event, '^{}*', 'i') && LANG(?Event) = "en")}} GROUP BY ?Event ?Start_Date ?End_Date ?Attendance ?Manifest ?Type
single.event_songs: SELECT ?Song ?Genre ?Performed_By WHERE {{ ?EventItem a music:Event. ?EventItem music:hasSongPerformed ?SongItem. ?SongItem music:hasGenre ?Genre. ?SongItem music:writtenBy ?Performed_ByItem. ?Performed_ByItem music:hostOf ?EventItem. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?EventLabel. ?SongItem rdfs:label ?Song. ?Performed_ByItem rdfs:label ?Performed_By. FILTER(REGEX(?EventLabel, '^{}*', 'i') && LANG(?EventLabel) = "en" && LANG(?Song) = "en" && LANG(?Performed_By) = "en") }}
